alert.note: Alert for Calvert; Central and Southeast Montgomery; Northwest Montgomery; Prince Georges (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 18 at 4:59AM EST until February 18 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Southwest winds becoming west to northwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...In Maryland, Calvert, Prince Georges, Central and Southeast Montgomery and Northwest Montgomery Counties. In District of Columbia, District of Columbia. In Virginia, Eastern Loudoun, Western Loudoun and Fairfax Counties, and Arlington/Falls Church/Alexandria. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Calvert; Central and Southeast Montgomery; Northwest Montgomery; Prince Georges
